TopicTitle: I need some help with my mod

Articles.Content:
It's a mod that adds more moons to Eve. But the problem is, I set Rarus to be like Gilly, all bumpy and stuff, but it doesn't work.

![b9BCbzC.png](https://i.imgur.com/b9BCbzC.png)

- - - Updated - - -

Also, what's a source code? I want to release this mod, but I apparently need a source code.

> 
> Also, what's a source code? I want to release this mod, but I apparently need a source code.

Whatever you used to make the mod happen, and is of your own creation, is your source code. (I think. If you get sued don't come after me, though I'm 95% certain.)

> 
> Whatever you used to make the mod happen, and is of your own creation, is your source code. (I think. If you get sued don't come after me, though I'm 95% certain.)

Oh, alright then. But do you know how to fix my main problem?
What's your radius? I get the feeling it's throwing you off there. (Gilly-level bumpiness isn't very bumpy on a Mun-sized body)

I take it your using KopericusTech? It would probably be better to ask in the [KopernicusTech thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109122-WIP-KopernicusTech-An-integration-attempt-between-Kopernicus-and-KittopiaTech-%28v0-13-03-26-15%29). Since your mod is a planet pack, the mod itself is the source code, the source code requirements only apply to compiled libraries IIRC.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-07T01:47:08Z" title="04/07/2015 01:47  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 7, 2015</time> by DuoDex**
ill pm you, i can help
